tool_description: Best in class and highly scalable asynchronous bulk Image Processing API.
name: Rapid Image Processing
title: Rapid Image Processing

api_list.name: /api/v1/files/{id}/url
api_list.description:
Returns a URL where the file can be downloaded.
The URL will expire in a short timespan.

api_list.name: /api/v1/transformations/{id}
api_list.description:
Holds information about the current progress of the transformation.
            The OperationState indicates if the Transformation has completely finished.
            In the list of Success you will find the created images (correlationId is the imageId) and
            in the list of Failures you will find the failed transformations.

api_list.name: /api/v1/health
api_list.description: Provides an indication about the health of the API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rapid-image-processing.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/health"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rapid-image-processing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /api/v1/files/{id}/metadata
api_list.description:
Returns the associated metadata to the file.
The URL will expire in a short timespan.

api_list.name: /api/v1/files/{id}
api_list.description:
Redirects the caller to location of the file.
Most HttpClient implementations directly download the file.
